message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire this item. We're offering it to you at a special price of $12000. This represents a significant value for you, considering its worth to you is $10000, and it also secures a good profit margin for us. Please let us know if this offer meets your expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, $12000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10500 for it.  This would still allow you a good profit margin, and it's closer to my budget.  Let me know if this is something we can work with.
